text.headline: Lake County Golf Course in California, USA
text.text:
The proposed golf course in Guenoc Valley has the potential to be a valuable asset to the community. The routing by Tom Doak, a renowned golf course architect, would be located on 1,000 acres of land in a remote, rural area in the northern part of Lake County.

The project would be a valuable addition to the area's recreational offerings. To revive the project, the developer could work with local residents to address their concerns, most importantly to develop a plan to address water conservation measures.
